- [93mOrganosulfur[0m-[93mRich[0m [93mPorous[0m [93mCarbon[0m [93mCathode[0m [93mEnables[0m [93mSoluble[0m-[93mPolysulfide[0m-[93mFree[0m and [93mHigh[0m-[93mRate[0m [93mPotassium[0m-[93mSulfur[0m [93mBatteries[0m.: [93mPotassium[0m-[93msulfur[0m ([93mK[0m-[93mS[0m) [93mbatteries[0m are [93memerging[0m as [93mone[0m of the [93mmost[0m [93mpromising[0m [93mcandidates[0m for [93mnext[0m-[93mgeneration[0m [93menergy[0m [93mstorage[0m, [93mowing[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mhigh[0m [93menergy[0m [93mdensity[0m and [93mcost[0m-[93meffectiveness[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93msevere[0m [93mpolysulfide[0m [93mshuttle[0m [93meffect[0m and [93msluggish[0m [93mredox[0m [93mkinetics[0m of [93msulfur[0m [93mcathodes[0m [93mremain[0m [93mcritical[0m [93mbarriers[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mpractical[0m [93mapplication[0m. [93mHerein[0m, a [93mclass[0m of [93morganosulfur[0m-[93mrich[0m [93mporous[0m [93mcarbon[0m ([93mOSPC[0m) [93mhas[0m been [93mdeveloped[0m as a [93mhigh[0m-[93mperformance[0m [93mcathode[0m for [93msoluble[0m-[93mpolysulfide[0m-[93mfree[0m and [93mhigh[0m-[93mrate[0m [93mK[0m-[93mS[0m [93mbatteries[0m. The as-[92mconstructed[0m [93mOSPC[0m [93machieves[0m [93mmolecular[0m-[93mscale[0m [93mconfinement[0m of [93msulfur[0m [93mspecies[0m within the [93mcarbon[0m [93mskeleton[0m [93mvia[0m [93mcovalent[0m [93mbonding[0m, which [93menables[0m [93msolid[0m-[93msolid[0m [93msulfur[0m [93mredox[0m [91mpathways[0m without [93mgeneration[0m of [93melectrolyte[0m-[93msoluble[0m [93mpolysulfides[0m. [93mMoreover[0m, the [93mconductive[0m [93mcarbon[0m [93mskeleton[0m of [93mOSPC[0m with [93mwell[0m-[93mdeveloped[0m [93mporosity[0m [93mcan[0m [93mfacilitate[0m [93mpotassium[0m [93mion[0m and [93melectron[0m [93mtransport[0m within the [93mbulk[0m [93mcathode[0m and [93msignificantly[0m [93mimprove[0m [93msulfur[0m [93mredox[0m [93mkinetics[0m. [93mBenefiting[0m from these [95mintegrated[0m [93mmerits[0m, [93mexcellent[0m [93mhigh[0m [93mrate[0m [93mcapability[0m ([93m240[0m.[93m8[0m [93mmAh[0m [93mg[0m -[93m1[0m at [93m5[0m A [93mg[0m -[93m1[0m [93mbased[0m on the [93mmass[0m of [93mOSPC[0m), [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93mcycling[0m [93mstability[0m ([93m77[0m% [93mretention[0m after [93m500[0m [93mcycles[0m at [93m5[0m A [93mg[0m -[93m1[0m ), and [93mremarkable[0m [93mareal[0m [93mcapacity[0m ([93m4[0m.[93m5[0m [93mmAh[0m [93mcm[0m -[93m2[0m ) [93mcan[0m be [93machieved[0m for the [93mOSPC[0m [93mcathodes[0m. [93mAdditionally[0m, the [93mfeasibility[0m of [93msynthesizing[0m [93mOSPC[0m from [93mreal[0m-[93mworld[0m [93mwaste[0m [93mplastics[0m is [93mdemonstrated[0m, which [93moffers[0m a [93mdual[0m [93mbenefit[0m of [93malleviating[0m [93mplastic[0m [93mpollution[0m and [93menabling[0m the [93mfabrication[0m of [93mlow[0m-[93mcost[0m [93myet[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mperformance[0m [93mcathodes[0m for [93mK[0m-[93mS[0m [93mbatteries[0m.
